tha-ap356:0.3_0: Hearing his own pores, short of the senior monks,
tha-ap356:1.1_0: Having seen the state of grace,
tha-ap356:1.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
tha-ap356:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap356:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap356:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap356:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsī.
tha-ap356:6.1_0: a fourth part of the senior monks, making offerings.
